paper.title: Factorization of Univariate Integer Polynomials by Diophantine Aproximation and an Improved Basis Reduction Algorithm
paper.venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming
paper.abstract: All steps described in the preceding section for fixed m are certainly covered by the rather crude bound of \(O(m(n^{5 + \varepsilon } + n^3 (log|f|)^{2 + \varepsilon } ))\) bit operations. For a factor p of degree \(k \leqslant \frac{n}{2}\) this bound applies for m=2,4,... until some m with m/2 n/2 (possibly f itself), thus the final time bound \(O(n^{6 + \varepsilon } + n^4 (log|f|)^{2 + \varepsilon } ))\) is obtained.
